description: This course will provide students with the necessary foundational skills required to commence midwifery practice. An overview of skills required to provide novice level midwifery care in the antepartum, intrapartum and postpartum periods including newborn care will be developed through simulation and commencement of clinical practice. Students will also commence the requisite 20 continuity of care experiences required for completion of the degree and subsequent registration as a midwife. In this course students will be assessed in practice ensuring safety and quality in their beginning level of midwifery practice.
